def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y in get2idxs(idxs):
        check_xy_same_size = same_size([x,y], ctx)
        check_x_lighter_y = is_lighter(x, y, ctx)
        check_x_right_y = is_right(x, y, ctx)
        check_y_right_circle = is_right(y, get_circle(idxs, ctx), ctx)
        if (
            check_xy_same_size
            and check_x_lighter_y
            and check_x_right_y
            and check_y_right_circle
        ):
            results.append([x,y])
    return results

def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y, z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_close = all_close([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_x_second_dark = x == second_darkest([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_x_medium_size = is_medium_size(x, ctx)
        check_x_bottom_left_circle = is_bottom_left(x, get_circle(idxs, ctx), ctx)
        check_y_darker_grey = is_darker(y, get_grey_dots(idxs, ctx), ctx)
        check_y_larger_x = is_larger(y, x, ctx)
        check_y_top_right_x = y == get_top_right([x,y], ctx)
        check_z_lighter_grey = is_lighter(z, get_grey_dots(idxs, ctx), ctx)
        check_z_slightly_larger_x = is_slightly_larger(z, x, ctx)
        check_z_top_left_original = z == get_top_left(get_black_dots(idxs, ctx), ctx)
        if (
            check_xyz_close
            and check_x_second_dark
            and check_x_medium_size
            and check_x_bottom_left_circle
            and check_y_darker_grey
            and check_y_larger_x
            and check_y_top_right_x
            and check_z_lighter_grey
            and check_z_slightly_larger_x
            and check_z_top_left_original
        ):
            results.append([x,y,z])
    return results
state = turn(state)
